improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: The industry-leading VADER (Valence Aware Dictionary and sEntiment Reasoner) model powers our sentiment analysis tool, delivering unparalleled accuracy in detecting nuanced emotions and sentiments across languages. Unlike other tools that struggle with idioms, sarcasm, and figurative language, our tool excels at analyzing complex text inputs with ease. With its unparalleled precision and depth of analysis, this tool is the gold standard for sentiment analysis, capable of handling over 140 languages, including but not limited to English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese and many more.
name: vader_sentiment_analysis_v12_text_analysis_pro
